## Rmarkdown activity
Data science projects in R can use a special data file type called an Rmarkdwon (Rmd) file. To learn more about this file type and how to use it in Rstudio,  
  
1. Create a new project in Rstudio  
2. Download the file below  
3. Move it to the project directory  
4. Open the file and follow 

```{r, echo = FALSE}
HTML("<a href='www/objects/1-rmarkdown_activity_file.Rmd'>Download Rmd</a>")
```
